title: As Deadline Approaches, Iran Nuclear Talks Resume
teaser: The agreement would prevent Iran from developing a nuclear weapon. The talks are being held as Iran helps the U.S. fight the so-called Islamic State in Iraq.
contentencoded:
Secretary of State John Kerry is in Switzerland to meet with his Iranian counterpart to try to reach a framework accord on Iran’s nuclear program.

The agreement would prevent Iran from developing a nuclear weapon. The talks are being held as Iran helps the U.S. fight the so-called Islamic State in Iraq.

Here & Now security analyst Jim Walsh joins Jeremy Hobson to discuss the ongoing talks and the unexpected alliance between Iran and the U.S.

Guest

  • Jim Walsh, expert in international security at MIT’s Security Studies Program. He tweets @DrJimWalshMIT.
